title: Blue Origin set to fly its next crewed mission

title: Blue Origin to resume crewed New Shepard flights
summary: Blue Origin announced plans April 4 for its first crewed New Shepard flight in more than 18 months, a mission that will give an opportunity for America’s first Black astronaut candidate to finally go to space.

title: Ed Dwight To Finally Get His Flight to Space
summary: Ed Dwight will finally get to reach space on Blue Origin’s next flight of New Shepard. Like Wally Funk and the other “Mercury 13” women who thought they were in […]
